Introduction
This topic contains information on net worth determinations for claims received on or after October 18, 2018, including
bright-line net worth limits
example of when to consider the bright-line for net worth
storage of net worth calculator
when to calculate net worth
example 1 of calculating net worth
example 2 of calculating net worth
how net worth decreases
example 1 of a decrease in assets after a denial for excessive net worth
example 2 of a decrease in assets after a denial for excessive net worth
net worth and FTI
specific exclusions from assets
annuities, trusts, or other similar financial instruments as net worth
, and
example of excluding annuity income from net worth calculation
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J - Net Worth, Asset Transfers, and Penalty Periods
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J
